name: Google Books
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Books 节点。主要用于: Read data from Google Books

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: bookshelf

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get a volume resource based on ID
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many volumes filtered by query

myLibrary.name: myLibrary
myLibrary.natural_language_description: 参数名: My Library | 默认值: False | (必填项)

searchQuery.name: searchQuery
searchQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Query | 作用: Full-text search query string | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: ID of user | (必填项)

shelfId.name: shelfId
shelfId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bookshelf ID | 作用: ID of the bookshelf | (必填项)

volumeId.name: volumeId
volumeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Volume ID | 作用: ID of the volume | (必填项)

volumePosition.name: volumePosition
volumePosition.description: Position on shelf to move the item (0 puts the item before the current first item, 1 puts it between the first and the second and so on)
volumePosition.natural_language_description: 参数名: Volume Position | 作用: Position on shelf to move the item (0 puts the item before the current first item, 1 puts it between the first and the second and so on) | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 40
